content.title: Assistant Researcher in Visual Neuroscience & Data Science
content.company: @ Centre universitaire de sant√© McGill | McGill University Health Centre
content.description: Conducted Representational Similarity Analysis (RSA) and Temporal Similarity Analysis (TSA) on surface-based fMRI data to investigate neural representations of natural scenes. Focused on the analysis of nodes in visual areas (V1, V2, V3), creating correlation matrices and visualizing results through TDApplied.
